entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cape George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:07 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or freezing rain changing to freezing rain this evening then to snow near midnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
